TMDA In Use

The following sites use TMDA as part of a product or service offering. If you'd like to be included in this list, please let me know.

  • The Free Software Foundation (for @gnu.org addresses and mail.gnu.org lists)

  • Gmane

  • NightSky Hosting

  • MailSnare

  • dungog.net

  • Stand Blue Technology

  • Open Vistas Networking, Inc.

  • myprivacy.ca

  • 2ndmail.com

  • Internet Nebraska

  • eScrubber

  • Gravital Dot Net

  • Stanford Computer Graphics Laboratory

  • CentralPets

  • my.gnus.org

  • mail.socha.net

  • Rupture Dot Net

  • Raymond Hosting

  • Paradigm-Omega

  • Mintersoft's VisualMail is a web-based e-mail client with integrated TMDA functionality.
